attributes.action: Withdraw the plans to increase Road Tax in 2009 and 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm afraid that this policy has no justification whatsoever. I drive a Ford Mondeo and will be paying £400 a year by 2010 just to tax it. If this was a green policy the government wouldn't be increasing the tax on cars that are already on the road. (Unless you are expecting us to crush them all?!) So we the undersigned want a straight answer to the following; why increase taxes for cars already on the road and where is the extra revenue being spent?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
